title: Tesco | SDE II | Bangalore
content:
Education: Bachelor of Technology (IIT/NIT/IIIT)
Years of Experience: ~4.5 YOE (Graduated in 2019)
Prior Experience: SDE 2 with Retail Giant
Previous CTC: ~42L (28.6 Base + 5.72 Performance Bouns + 7.15 Stock (Vested over 3 years))
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Tesco Bengaluru
Title: SDE II
Base: 52 L + 1.7 L (PF)
Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 10% of Base (Bonus is usually with SDE III role only at tesco is what recrutier told, now they started giving to higher band of SDE II also)
Relocation Bonus : No Relocation Bonus

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5194043/Tesco-or-SDE-II-or-Interview-Experience-or-January-2024

title: Viacom 18 | Jiocinema | SDE 2 | Banglore | Advice Needed
content:
Education: Non-circuital branch(Tier-1)
Years of Experience: ~ 2 years
Current comp: ~ INR 27.25 LPA (21 Base + Annual bonus + ESOPS)
Prior Experience: Product based company
Date of the Offer: May '24
Company: Viacom18 (JioCinema)
Title/Level: SDE 2 - NodeJS
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 27.9 LPA
Performance Bonus: ~3.1 LPA (10% of base salary)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 31L
Benefits: Standard benefits

I don't have any other offer in hand currently. But I just want advice is it a good amount, or HR lowballed me with this offer. I tried to negotiate but this is the best they said they can do

title: Tesco | SDE II | Bangalore |
content:
* Education: B.Tech, IIT
* Years of Experience: 5
* Experience: 5 years, Software Developer in a startup
* Date of the Offer: 25th April, 2024
* Company: Tesco
* Title/Level: SDE ll
* Location: Bengaluru
* Base pay: INR 4000000 (PF + Gratuity included)
* Relocation Bonus: 1.5/2 Lakh
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 42 lpa
* Benefits: standard benefits like insurance

title: [Offer Eval] Microsoft L63 Senior Software Engineer
content:
Education: Tier 1
Years of Experience: 7 years
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at Amazon
Current CTC: 70L
Date of the Offer: Mid May
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SSE - L63
Location: Bangalore
Fixed Salary: 54L
Signing Bonus: None
Relocation : 3L
RSU: $180K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 30% of base, considering 15% ~ 8.1L
Total comp for 1st year: ~ 54 +8.1 + 36 + 3  = ~101.3
Benefits: Standard MS benefits

Wondering if I should negotiate on this offer. I have my last rounds ongoing with Google and Meta(London). Even if I clear those, team matching might take months.

Would be great if anyone can express any thoughts.

P.S: I will write my interview experience soon.
